Feature.Name: Beacon
Feature.Text: The bearer can use a bonus action to cause the item to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, or to extinguish the light.

MagicProperty.Name: Property - Beacon
MagicProperty.Description: The bearer can use a bonus action to cause the item to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, or to extinguish the light.
